product_name: SmartWool Lightweight Front Range Pullover Sweater - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Simple and versatile, the SmartWool Lightweight Front Range Pullover Sweater for women is a top you'll reach for again and again on cool days when you want to look and feel great. 100% merino wool offers soft, naturally breathable comfort and lightweight warmth. Front of pullover features a reverse jersey knit; the back features a 2-color faux marl with seed-stitch texture. Rib-knit cuffs. SmartWool Lightweight Front Range Pullover Sweater is semi-formfitting. Closeout.
short_description: Simple and versatile, the SmartWool Lightweight Front Range Pullover Sweater for women is a top you'll reach for again and again on cool days when you want to look and feel great.
